p: To determine whether FI-EV71 elicited a humoral immune response against EV71, the immunogenicity was assessed by ELISAs and neutralization antibody assays. EV71-specific IgG antibodies were induced in all group at 2 WPV ( Fig 1A). The anti-EV71 IgG titers were gradually increased following booster immunization and remained constant until the end of the experiment.
